ValidationRule.description: Once Opportunity is in stages 5 (Vyprodaná), 7 (Spárovaná) or 4 (Zrušená) the stage can't be changed again.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( TEXT(PRIORVALUE(StageName))== "5", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(StageName))== "7", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(StageName))== "4" ), ISCHANGED(StageName), $Profile.Name <> 'IntegrationUser' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stage change is not allowed once it is closed.
